content:
When it comes to Bordeaux wine, some good vintage options in the last decade include:

* Château Margaux: 2010, 2016, 2018
* Château Latour: 2010, 2016
* Château Lafite Rothschild: 2010, 2016, 2018
* Château Brane-Cantenac: 2010, 2016, 2018
* Château La Tour Carnet: 2010, 2016, 2018
* Château Pichon Longueville Baron: 2010, 2016, 2018
* Château Clos du Marquis: 2010, 2016, 2018
* Château d'Aiguilhe: 2010, 2016, 2018

Please keep in mind that vintage is just one aspect to consider when choosing a wine, and personal taste ultimately plays a bigger role. It's also worth noting that a wine's vintage may not be the only indicator of its quality and that you should also consider the producer and the specific vineyard.
